title: Midnight Cinderella - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Animal Characteristics   Beautiful Female Lead   Body Swap   Celebrities   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Pets   Showbiz
author: Ban Li Zi   Chestnut   板栗子
description:
Newly crowned Film Emperor Feng Jing; good looks, good stature, good acting, good character. Except he has one unshakeable rule—any drama he acts in cannot go past 12 o’clock. The media, with ulterior motives, chases after this little crazy secret of his. Yet remaining unconcerned about how the outside world falls into turbulent times, Film Emperor Feng still stands tall and unmoved.

Jiang Ran recently felt that her dog has become somewhat strange. Ordinarily when she kisses, hugs, and raises her dog up high, her dog would always be especially happy and lovable. Now whenever she kisses, hugs, and raises her dog up high, however, her dog was horny…>
